game.name: Mourningwood Lodge:Pray
game.categories: Single-player, Custom Volume Controls, Keyboard Only Option, Mouse Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: "Mourningwood Lodge:Pray" is a full-motion video (FMV) live-action mystery horror game. As the third installment in the "Mourningwood Lodge" series, players will delve into an entirely new story, assuming the role of a fresh character to embark on a suspenseful journey.
game.shortDescriptionEn: "Mourningwood Lodge:Pray" is a full-motion video (FMV) live-action mystery horror game. As the third installment in the "Mourningwood Lodge" series, players will delve into an entirely new story, assuming the role of a fresh character to embark on a suspenseful journey.
